schemas.name: Status
schemas.html: در دست بررسی
schemas.script:
let suspend = value[5eb51d96e0c8f42098fe2c3f]
let isSuspend = Array.isArray(suspend) && suspend.length > 0

if (isSuspend) {
    classList = "bg-orange"
    status = "translate[SUSPENDED]"
}

let CONTRACTOR_REQUESTid = "value[5eb519b4e0c8f42098fdaf60]"
let CONTRACTOR_REQUEST_DATE = "value[5eb519c2e0c8f42098fdb627]"
let ADVISER_ACCEPTid = "value[5efc95a142cb9a2924f4a994]"
let ADVISER_ACCEPT_DATE = "value[5eb51a42e0c8f42098fdc61a]"
let EMPLOYER_COMMUNICATEid = "value[5eb51a6de0c8f42098fdcf4d]"
let EMPLOYER_COMMUNICATE_DATE = "value[5eb51a7ae0c8f42098fdd63e]"
let TEMPORARY_HANDOVER_DATE = "value[5eb51acfe0c8f42098fdeb45]"

let isTemporaryHandover = [
    CONTRACTOR_REQUESTid,
    CONTRACTOR_REQUEST_DATE,
    ADVISER_ACCEPTid,
    ADVISER_ACCEPT_DATE,
    EMPLOYER_COMMUNICATEid,
    EMPLOYER_COMMUNICATE_DATE,
    TEMPORARY_HANDOVER_DATE
].some(item => item && item !== "undefined")

let contractStatus = document.querySelector(".contract-status")
let contractStatusText = document.querySelector(".contract-status-text")
let classList = ""
let status = ""

if (isTemporaryHandover) {
    classList = "bg-yellow"
    status = "translate[TEMPORARY_HANDOVERED]"
}

CONTRACTOR_REQUESTid = "value[5efc8e33b6c53b191003f1b9]"
CONTRACTOR_REQUEST_DATE = "value[5efc95320fb07a03bc8d4c48]"
ADVISER_ACCEPTid = "value[5eb51a34e0c8f42098fdbf3e]"
ADVISER_ACCEPT_DATE = "value[5efc95d40bce090d44e41cfa]"
EMPLOYER_COMMUNICATEid = "value[5efc96012481d01664ad293b]"
EMPLOYER_COMMUNICATE_DATE = "value[5efc962325d9a6118c8e4318]"

let FINAL_HANDOVER_DATE = "value[5efc96498913b0032852b9bf]"

let isFinalHandover = [
    CONTRACTOR_REQUESTid,
    CONTRACTOR_REQUEST_DATE,
    ADVISER_ACCEPTid,
    ADVISER_ACCEPT_DATE,
    EMPLOYER_COMMUNICATEid,
    EMPLOYER_COMMUNICATE_DATE,
    FINAL_HANDOVER_DATE
].some(item => item && item !== "undefined")

if (isFinalHandover) {
    classList = "bg-green"
    status = "translate[HANDOVERED]"
}

let TERMINATE_EMPLOYER_LETTERid = "value[5eb54de0a927490ae8c2d4b1]"
let TERMINATE_EMPLOYER_LETTER_DATE = "value[5eb54df1a927490ae8c2dcbc]"
let TERMINATE_REASON = "value[5eb54e7aa927490ae8c2e4d0]"
let DESCRIPTIONS = "value[5eb54e93a927490ae8c2efa3]"

let isTerminated = [
    TERMINATE_EMPLOYER_LETTERid,
    TERMINATE_EMPLOYER_LETTER_DATE,
    TERMINATE_REASON,
    DESCRIPTIONS
].some(item => item && item !== "undefined")

if (isTerminated) {
    classList = "bg-red"
    status = "translate[TERMINATED]"
}

if (classList) contractStatus.classList.add(classList)
if (status) contractStatusText.textContent = status

schemas.name: End Date Calculated
schemas.formula:
isAvailble(
  getValue("5eb2611664190b08e4a51eb6"),
  getValue("607d7717c300532a187b8fe2"),
  getValue("607d7739c300532a187b8fe3")
) ? addToDate(
  getValue("5eb2611664190b08e4a51eb6"),
  getValue("607d7717c300532a187b8fe2"),
  getValue("607d7739c300532a187b8fe3")
) : ""

fa: معاملات برون مرزی و برون سپاری
حمل و نقل / کامیون سازی / راه آهن
